title: PHP-表格数据
text: 之前都是使用jsp来写动态页面。刚刚接触PHP。主要是如上所示的图标展示，从数据库获取数据展示。 表格控件使用的是sChart。 数据库链接1234567891011<?php$host="47.93.253.45";$db_user="root";$db_pass="root";$db_name="ubuntu";$timezone="Asia/Shanghai";$link=mysql_connect($host,$db_user,$db_pass);mysql_select_db($db_name,$link);mysql_query("SET names UTF8");?> 数据获取1234567891011121314151617181920212223<?php include_once('connect.php'); $res = mysql_query("select * from chart_pie where type = '8'"); while($row = mysql_fetch_array($res)){ $arr[] = array( "name" => $row['title'], "value" => intval($row['pv']) ); } $res2 = mysql_query("select * from chart_pie where type = '9'"); while($row2 = mysql_fetch_array($res2)){ $arr2[] = array( "name" => $row2['title'], "value" => intval($row2['pv']) ); } $data = json_encode($arr); $data2 = json_encode($arr2); //echo $data;?> 页面展示12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <title>手机税税通申报情况</title> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no"> <style> .main{ padding: 0px; text-align: center; } </style></head><body> <h2 align='center'>手机税税通申报情况</h2> <div class="main"> <canvas id="canvas0" width="1304" height="350"></canvas> <canvas id="canvas1" width="650" height="320"></canvas> <canvas id="canvas2" width="650" height="320"></canvas> </div> <script src="sChart.min.js"></script> <script> var data1 = <?php echo $data;?>; var data2 = <?php echo $data2;?>; new sChart('canvas0', 'line', data1, { title: '手机税税通7月份申报情况-分区市', bgColor: '#829dda', titleColor: '#ffffff', fillColor: '#72f6ff', axisColor: '#eeeeee', contentColor: '#bbbbbb' }); new sChart('canvas1', 'bar', data1, { title: '手机税税通7月份申报情况-分区市', bgColor: '#829dda', titleColor: '#ffffff', fillColor: '#72f6ff', axisColor: '#eeeeee', contentColor: '#bbbbbb' }); new sChart('canvas2', 'pie', data2, { title: '手机税税通7月份申报情况-客户端', bgColor: '#829dda', titleColor: '#ffffff', legendColor: '#ffffff' }); </script></body></html> —— END. loaLakers on 07.10
